structure.unit: B LICENSURE AND REGULATION OF HEALTH FACILITIES AND SERVICES

text.section: If a public hearing is granted, it shall be held within thirty (30) days after the decision to grant the request for reconsideration. The hearing shall be conducted in accordance with the provisions of this chapter. The cabinet shall make its decision on reconsideration and shall give notice thereof. The decision of the cabinet shall be final for purposes of judicial appeal. An approved certificate of need shall be issued forty (40) days after notice of the cabinet's decision unless a judicial appeal is taken and issuance is enjoined by the court.
